The getIntersection function's code:

pr getIntersection (pr a, pr b) {
    long tx = Math.max(a.x + a.p, b.x + b.p);
    long ty = Math.max(a.p - a.x, b.p - b.x);
    return new pr( (tx - ty)/2, (tx + ty)/2 );
}
